name: AI-Powered Search Feature Specification
content:
AI-Powered Search Feature Specification

Overview:

Implement an AI-powered search functionality to enhance document discovery and retrieval across the platform.

Business Requirements:

  • Improve search accuracy by 40%

  • Reduce search time by 60%

  • Support natural language queries

  • Maintain response time under 200ms

Technical Specifications:

  1. Search Engine

    • Elasticsearch v8.12.0

    • Vector search capability

    • Custom analyzers for multiple languages

  2. AI Components

    • OpenAI embeddings API

    • Query understanding model

    • Result ranking model

  3. Infrastructure

    • Kubernetes deployment

    • Auto-scaling configuration

    • Multi-region support

User Interface:

  • Search bar with type-ahead

  • Filters panel

    • Date range

    • Document type

    • Department

  • Results view

    • Relevance score

    • Preview snippet

    • Quick actions

Implementation Phases:

  1. Phase 1: Basic Search (Week 1-2)

  2. Phase 2: AI Integration (Week 3-4)

  3. Phase 3: UI Enhancement (Week 5-6)

  4. Phase 4: Testing (Week 7-8)

Success Metrics:

  • Search precision > 90%

  • Recall rate > 85%

  • User satisfaction > 4.5/5
